segment.source: Windows Performance Toolkit
segment.target: Windows Performance Toolkit

segment.source: Included in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit, the Windows Performance Toolkit consists of performance monitoring tools that produce in-depth performance profiles of Windows operating systems and applications.
segment.target: Included in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit, the Windows Performance Toolkit consists of performance monitoring tools that produce in-depth performance profiles of Windows operating systems and applications.

segment.source: Windows Performance Toolkit
segment.target: Windows Performance Toolkit

segment.source: Included in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit, the Windows Performance Toolkit consists of performance monitoring tools that produce in-depth performance profiles of Windows operating systems and applications.
segment.target: Included in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit, the Windows Performance Toolkit consists of performance monitoring tools that produce in-depth performance profiles of Windows operating systems and applications.

segment.source: This documentation discusses both Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) and Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).
segment.target: This documentation discusses both Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) and Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).

segment.source: Windows Performance Toolkit
segment.target: Windows Performance Toolkit

segment.source: The Windows Performance Toolkit consists of two independent tools: Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) and Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).
segment.target: The Windows Performance Toolkit consists of two independent tools: Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) and Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).

segment.source: In addition, support is maintained for the previous command-line tool, Xperf.
segment.target: In addition, support is maintained for the previous command-line tool, Xperf.

segment.source: However, Xperfview is no longer supported.
segment.target: However, Xperfview is no longer supported.

segment.source: All recordings must be opened and analyzed by using WPA.
segment.target: All recordings must be opened and analyzed by using WPA.

segment.source: The following are the system requirements for running Windows Performance Toolkit:
segment.target: The following are the system requirements for running Windows Performance Toolkit:

segment.source: Windows Performance Recorder (WPR): Windows 8 or later.
segment.target: Windows Performance Recorder (WPR): Windows 8 or later.

segment.source: Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA): Windows 8 or later with the Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 or later.
segment.target: Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA): Windows 8 or later with the Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 or later.

segment.source: Windows Performance Recorder
segment.target: Windows Performance Recorder

segment.source: WPR is a powerful recording tool that creates Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) recordings.
segment.target: WPR is a powerful recording tool that creates Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) recordings.

segment.source: You can run WPR from the user interface (UI) or from the command line.
segment.target: You can run WPR from the user interface (UI) or from the command line.

segment.source: WPR provides built-in profiles that you can use to select the events that are to be recorded.
segment.target: WPR provides built-in profiles that you can use to select the events that are to be recorded.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can author custom profiles in XML.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can author custom profiles in XML.

segment.source: WPR can also be invoked and controlled by using the WPRControl application programming interface (API).
segment.target: WPR can also be invoked and controlled by using the WPRControl application programming interface (API).

segment.source: For more information about the WPRControl API, see WPRControl API Reference.
segment.target: For more information about the WPRControl API, see WPRControl API Reference.

segment.source: For basic procedures and a detailed walkthrough, see the WPR Quick Start.
segment.target: For basic procedures and a detailed walkthrough, see the WPR Quick Start.

segment.source: For complete documentation of the WPR UI, see WPR Features.
segment.target: For complete documentation of the WPR UI, see WPR Features.

segment.source: For reference of command-line options, see WPR Command-Line Options.
segment.target: For reference of command-line options, see WPR Command-Line Options.

segment.source: For step-by-step procedures, see WPR How-to Topics.
segment.target: For step-by-step procedures, see WPR How-to Topics.

segment.source: For discussion of key scenarios, see WPR Scenarios.
segment.target: For discussion of key scenarios, see WPR Scenarios.

segment.source: For complete reference material, including a recording profile XML reference and a legacy Xperf reference, see WPR Reference.
segment.target: For complete reference material, including a recording profile XML reference and a legacy Xperf reference, see WPR Reference.

segment.source: Windows Performance Analyzer
segment.target: Windows Performance Analyzer

segment.source: WPA is a powerful analysis tool that combines a very flexible UI with extensive graphing capabilities and data tables that can be pivoted and that have full text search capabilities.
segment.target: WPA is a powerful analysis tool that combines a very flexible UI with extensive graphing capabilities and data tables that can be pivoted and that have full text search capabilities.

segment.source: WPA provides an Issues window to explore the root cause of any identified.
segment.target: WPA provides an Issues window to explore the root cause of any identified.

segment.source: For basic procedures and a detailed walkthrough, see the WPA Quick Start Guide.
segment.target: For basic procedures and a detailed walkthrough, see the WPA Quick Start Guide.

segment.source: For complete documentation of the WPR UI, see WPA Features.
segment.target: For complete documentation of the WPR UI, see WPA Features.

segment.source: For step-by-step procedures, see WPA How-to topics.
segment.target: For step-by-step procedures, see WPA How-to topics.

segment.source: For extended discussion of key scenarios, see WPA Scenarios.
segment.target: For extended discussion of key scenarios, see WPA Scenarios.

segment.source: You can download the Windows Performance Toolkit by visiting Windows Insider Program.
segment.target: You can download the Windows Performance Toolkit by visiting Windows Insider Program.

segment.target: Provides complete documentation for WPR.

segment.target: On MSDN, this includes a complete command-line and Extensible Markup Language (XML) reference.

segment.source: Kernel Trace Control API Reference
segment.target: Kernel Trace Control API Reference

segment.source: Covers the Kernel Trace Control API, an extension of the ETA Event Tracing API that is supported for backward compatibility with existing scripts and profiles.
segment.target: Covers the Kernel Trace Control API, an extension of the ETA Event Tracing API that is supported for backward compatibility with existing scripts and profiles.

segment.source: Windows Performance Analyzer
segment.target: Windows Performance Analyzer

segment.source: Provides complete documentation for WPA to enable you to analyze recordings created with WPR or from the Assessment Platform.
segment.target: Provides complete documentation for WPA to enable you to analyze recordings created with WPR or from the Assessment Platform.

segment.target: Windows Performance Step-by-Step Guides
